metadata.name: SQLite Chromium Profile Data DB Access
metadata.comment: Detect usage of the "sqlite" binary to query databases in Chromium-based browsers for potential data stealing.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('sqlite') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\sqlite.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\sqlite3.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\user data\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\opera software\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\chromiumviewer\\\\'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('login data')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cookies')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('web data')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('history')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bookmarks'))))

output.summary: Detect usage of the "sqlite" binary to query databases in Chromium-based browsers for potential data stealing.
